classes.title: PHYI50.
classes.subtitle: First-Year Seminar: Human Physiology.  3 Credits.
classes.description: Clinical cases are used to introduce the study of physiology. Students develop learning objectives and research selected topics in health and disease. Final class project is a group endeavor.Gen Ed: PL.Grading status: Letter grade.

classes.title: PHYI292
classes.subtitle: Introduction to Physiology.  5 Credits.
classes.description: Clinical cases are used to introduce the study of physiology. Students develop learning objectives and research selected topics in health and disease. Final class project is a group endeavor.Gen Ed: PL.Grading status: Letter grade.

classes.title: PHYI292
classes.subtitle: Introduction to Physiology.  5 Credits.
classes.description: A course in human physiology exploring physiological processes from molecular to organ systems levels including regulation and interrelationships. classes.subtitle: Undergraduate Research in Physiology.  1-6 Credits.
